image.title: car rental service mobile app
image.description: Developed a concept for a car rental mobile app, allowing users to book vehicles across the world hassle-free. The filtering system assists in finding a suitable car quickly.

video.title: cryptocurrency exchange website & mobile app
video.description: Designed a cryptocurrency exchange mobile  app and it's promo landing page for improved marketing strategies. The design has the clarity and ease of use that people seel in trading apps

image.title: cargo delivery company website
image.description: Created a website design for a cargo delivery company with a focus on worldwide shipment. The minimalistic approach helps the clients submit the information and estimate the delivery.

video.title: cyber VPN mobile app design concept
video.description: Built a VPN mobile app design with a touch of cyberpunk and sci-fi styles. Dark aesthetics reduce eye strain, while users enjoy fast internet connections

image.title: flight tickets booking mobile app
image.description: Designed a mobile app concept for booking flight tickets on the go. Quick and easy purchase with glanceable data representation

video.title: intelligent contact manager product dashboard
video.description: Developed a design for an intelligent contact manager that helps busy professional streamline their workflow and boost their productivity.

image.title: esport analytics dashboard
image.description: Created a web dashboard for Esports and gaming industry analytics. It clearly shows statistics and makes all crucial info glanceable

video.title: no code constructor design concept
video.description: Built a no-code constructor design concept that is clear and easy to grasp for people without any technical knowledge. All essential tools are at the user's fingertips
